query:
SELECT
                b.id, 
                b.title,
                b.created_at,
                b.updated_at,
                bo.opened_at as "opened_at?"
            FROM blocks b
            LEFT JOIN block_opens bo ON bo.block_id = b.id
            WHERE 
                title LIKE $1 OR
                content LIKE $1
            ORDER BY updated_at DESC
            LIMIT 50
